InstructionText.label: Provide an api-key with proper available credit. If OpenAI is choosen you must add some specific credit (10-30$ can be enough) to your usual plan for api use, otherwise no available llms traffic will be available in this application.

user.label: User
user.help: Enter the user associated to the apiKey

provider.label: Large language model supplier

apiKey.label: Api key
apiKey.help: Your api key of the LLMS providers to be used

MainPanel.label: Setup Graph Rag & knowledge extraction default configuration

description.label: Description
description.help:
Enter the description of this knowledge graph data extraction stage
                                    configuration

usedModelConfiguration.label: LLM used for data extraction
usedModelConfiguration.help:
Specify large language model used for knowledge extraction, default one will be
                                    used if none is
                                    selected.

code.label: Unique Code
code.help:
Automatically generated unique code of the knowledge graph data extraction
                                    stage

extractionPrompt.label: Information extraction prompt
extractionPrompt.help: Large language model prompt for entity/events/relation and aliases extraction

graphRagAllSources.label: Apply graph rag to all data sources
graphRagAllSources.help: If true all the knowledge bases/project/data sources will be processed for knowldge extraction, otherwise only those specifically configured will be

defaultModel.label: Default large language model
defaultModel.help: The default large language model will be used for knowledge extraction

processEveryDocument.label: Apply graph rag to all files
processEveryDocument.help:
The graph rag algoritms will be applied to all file this will enhance the
                                            details of
                                            analisys that the system is capable of but will high the cost and time
                                            required to process
                                            documents

contentSelectionFilter.label: File selection criterias for graphrag processing
contentSelectionFilter.help: Edit criterias on file to send to information extraction pipeline for graphrag, select at least a file name and criteria and/or a file type and/or the maximum number of bytes of file size and/or the age of last modification in days

path.label: Add a root folder of a shared filesystem
path.help: Choose a server folder that is a root path for the shared filesystem used in your organization as a document repository

description.help: Enter filesystem entry description

baseUri.help: Url of the base confluence system address for onpremise installation or your organization base url for confluence cloud system

token.help: Confluence CLOUD apikey acquired in the confluence backoffic, here "API Token for your Atlassian Account" have to be inserted.

description.help: Enter chat profile description.

code.help: Automatically generated unique code of the chat profile.

userChoosesKnowledgeBases.label: User chooses knowledge bases
userChoosesKnowledgeBases.help: User can choose from accessible knowledge bases and/or upload its own files.

knowledgeBaseCodes.label: Knowledge bases
knowledgeBaseCodes.help: Knowledge bases to use for document retrivial.

enabledFunctions.label: Enabled functions call for this RAG chat
enabledFunctions.help: Functionalities that could be used by the llm model during the chat with the user interacting also with the selected knowledge base

similaritySearchThreshold.label: Similarity threshold
similaritySearchThreshold.help: Similarity threshold for semantic searches, 0.600.65 Low filtering, 0.70-0.75 Medium filtering, 0.800.85 Accurate

disableMultiHopRag.label: Disable 'Multi Hop' rag
disableMultiHopRag.help: Disable the 'multi hop rag' functionality. Multi hop search does a first semantic search and uses found documents as a context for the semantic search itself providing a larger context.

topK.label: Considered document fragments (TopK)
topK.help: In the retrieve augmented generation, Top N found considered document fragments in semantic search

otherSearchSimilarityThreshold.label: 2nd 'hop' similarity threshold
otherSearchSimilarityThreshold.help: Similarity threshold for semantic searches, 0.600.65 Low filtering, 0.70-0.75 Medium filtering, 0.800.85 Accurate used from the 2nd search of multi-hop rag
